attributes.action: Axe all ggsce and other exams permanently.
attributes.additional_details: I would like action because students in 2020,2021 and 2022 got a teacher predicted grade and when students in 2023 undertake the exam it will be unfair because their grade will be lower than teacher predicted grade. Please switch to teacher predicted grade to make it fair for every student.
attributes.background: I would like the government or Parliament to axe exams all together. This is because exams will be stopped for 3 years and replaced with a teacher predicted grade. It is not fair for students in 2020,2021and 2022 to get a teacher predicted grade.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not aware of any plans to cancel 2022 exams. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
